message: Let's split the money fairly. I'm offering you 40% and keeping 60% for myself.  This is a good starting point for us to work with.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I think 30% is a fair starting point for me. Let's see if you can do better than this.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a larger share. I'm willing to offer you 25% and take 75% for myself.  We're both losing value with each round, so let's reach a deal quickly!
I'm not willing to give up much more, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. 20% is my minimum, and I hope you can understand that.
